CustomField.formula: If( amc__Cost_Budget__c = 0, "No Measurement", if((( amc__Cost_Forecast__c + amc__Material_Costs_Forecast__c + IF( amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c , amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c , amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c ) ) / amc__Cost_Budget__c)<0.8, "Under Project Budget", if((( amc__Cost_Forecast__c + amc__Material_Costs_Forecast__c + IF( amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c > amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c , amc__Actual_Project_Expenses__c , amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c ) ) / amc__Cost_Budget__c)<=1, "Within Project Budget", "Over Project Budget")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows performance based on Forecast Hours & Material Costs + whichever is greater out of Anticipated Project Expenses and Actual Project Expenses
CustomField.label: Forecast Performance
